response.overview: I've been flying for hours  No sign of a human being  Rain, rain, rain  I'm on the other side of the world  I see a clearing between the trees  I'm about to descend  I've stopped my engine in the air  To observe the two minutes of silence.  A cinematic remix of archival footage and personal home videos of flight and descent, following the audio diary of Mrs Victor Bruce, the first female aviator to fly solo around the world.
response.title: Bluebird
